publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2373 Trish Godman: Ferguson’s Shipyard, Port Glasgow—That the Parliament is of the view that Ferguson’s Shipyard, Port Glasgow, is one of the very best shipyards in Europe, is an important element in the local economy in an area of population decline and cannot be allowed to slip away and believes that it is of the utmost importance that the Scottish Executive does all in its power to ensure that both management and workforce are given a fair share of government contracts which, going by the yard’s excellent record, would be built on time, to cost and to the highest levels of design and construction.
